title: Intelligence: a complex concept
creator_credit: Coast Community College District and University of California, Los Angeles
brief_description: What is intelligence? There are hundreds of different ideas about the nature of intelligence. Reveals that there is confusion between what intelligence is as tests measure it and what intelligence is in everyday life.
